about_the_game:
Tales of Mist is a survival game integrating strategy and adventure in a decaying world. Plagued by the presence of witches and the tyranny of creatures straight out of fairy tales, take command of a city to bring light to this fog-filled world. This game with detailed pixel art aesthetics will lead you into a universe where the spirit of its inhabitants is as failing as the environment that inhabits them.

Machines, inventions, clocks, heroes, soldiers, tactics, religions, several elements will be necessary for you to defeat the many threats of this dismal tale of which you will be the hero and the commander.

content_descriptors.notes:
Fantasy combat, blood and death.
Usage of torture and execution devices such as fire and guillotines.
